description:
Company Description

Christian Brothers Automotive

At Christian Brothers Automotive, we’re in the business of serving others. Fixing cars is the vehicle for us to do just that. Founded in 1982 with a mission to love our neighbors as ourselves, we’ve quickly grown to over 290+ locations across 30 states. From our shops across the country to our Home Office headquarters in Houston, we’re committed to being a top place to work, prioritizing diverse perspectives, a joyful and collaborative work environment, and opportunities to serve our guests and communities.

Mission Statement: At Christian Brothers Automotive, we seek to glorify God by providing excellent and ethical automotive repair service for our customers.

Job Description

Job Title: Data Engineering Intern

Job Location: 17725 Katy Fwy, Houston, TX 77094

Job Overview:

We are preparing for our 2024 Summer Internship season!

The Data Engineering Intern is an entry-level cross-functional technical position that will assist Christian Brothers Automotive in collecting, administering, and manipulating data to ensure business continuity and allow business units to make informed decisions. This role will leverage software development methodologies to review and refactor applications that will automate a provisioning process using Domo, Smartsheet, and One Login.
• Work with the data engineering team to understand gaps in the existing solution
• Build a reliable framework to automate the syncing of Payroll data to Domo
• Test and verify reliability of python application

Qualifications

Qualifications:
• Self-motivated individual with a strong interest in data and software application technologies
• Diligent researcher and a self starter
• Strong communication and interpersonal skills
• Ability to apply critical thinking to a wide variety of problems
• Proficient in rigorous Quality Assurance
• Agile Project management and organizational skills

Education & Experience
• Up to 1 year of experience working with MySQL databases, including SQL Queries is preferred
• Up to 1 year of experience working with Python is preferred
• Experience performing root cause analysis to determine and resolve issues
• Proficient in web tools, Microsoft or Google office suites and Slack
• Proficient in Email, Calendar and task tracking software

Accountabilities

Accountable to the Brand, including the Franchisees, Technology Solutions team, Home Office team, Leadership team, and ultimately the company President. The Data Engineer Intern will report directly to the Manager of Data Engineering.

Physical Requirements:
• Occasionally bending, twisting, and turning.
• Sitting for extended periods of time.
• Occasionally lift and/or move up to 25 pounds.

Workplace Environment:
• This role will be located at the Home Office headquarters in Houston, TX.
• A great workplace culture that has won repeated Top Workplace accolades by the Houston Chronicle.
• Open office layout to promote collaboration, conversation, and teamwork.
• Options to work remote/home on Mondays and Fridays.

Additional Information

Base Salary: Competitive and commensurate with experience.

All of your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines. Christian Brothers Automotive is an Equal Opportunity Employer. CBAC maintains “At will” employment practices.
